alert.note: Alert for Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Holt County through 1230 AM CDT... At 1144 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles north of Page, or 16 miles northeast of O`neill, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Opportunity and Dorsey. This includes Highway 20 between mile markers 326 and 328. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Nebraska.
